title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 11, 2021
_seo_title: Awesome List Updates on Jun 11, 2021 - Track Awesome List

items.title: Awesome Pcaptools
items.content_text:
### Traffic Capture

*   [Arkime](https://arkime.com/) Arkime (formerly Moloch) is a large scale, open source, indexed packet capture and search tool.

### Traffic Analysis/Inspection

*   [Zeek](https://zeek.org/): (formerly Bro) is an open source software platform that provides compact, high-fidelity transaction logs, file content, and fully customized output to analysts, from the smallest home office to the largest, fastest research and commercial networks. From the FAQ:
    "Zeek provides a comprehensive platform for network traffic analysis, with a particular focus on semantic security monitoring at scale. While often compared to classic intrusion detection/prevention systems, Zeek takes a quite different approach by providing users with a flexible framework that facilitates customized, in-depth monitoring far beyond the capabilities of traditional systems. With initial versions already in operational deployment during the mid ‘90s, Zeek finds itself grounded in more than 20 years of research. For more information, see the Zeek Overview and our promotional document, Why Choose Zeek?."
items.content_html:
Traffic Capture

  • Arkime Arkime (formerly Moloch) is a large scale, open source, indexed packet capture and search tool.

Traffic Analysis/Inspection

  • Zeek: (formerly Bro) is an open source software platform that provides compact, high-fidelity transaction logs, file content, and fully customized output to analysts, from the smallest home office to the largest, fastest research and commercial networks. From the FAQ: "Zeek provides a comprehensive platform for network traffic analysis, with a particular focus on semantic security monitoring at scale. While often compared to classic intrusion detection/prevention systems, Zeek takes a quite different approach by providing users with a flexible framework that facilitates customized, in-depth monitoring far beyond the capabilities of traditional systems. With initial versions already in operational deployment during the mid ‘90s, Zeek finds itself grounded in more than 20 years of research. For more information, see the Zeek Overview and our promotional document, Why Choose Zeek?."

items.title: Awesome Tensorflow
items.content_text:
### Models/Projects

*   [Model Maker](https://www.tensorflow.org/lite/guide/model_maker) - A transfer learning library that simplifies the process of training, evaluation and deployment for TensorFlow Lite models (support: Image Classification, Object Detection, Text Classification, BERT Question Answer, Audio Classification, Recommendation etc.; [API reference](https://www.tensorflow.org/lite/api_docs/python/tflite_model_maker)).
items.content_html:
Models/Projects

  • Model Maker - A transfer learning library that simplifies the process of training, evaluation and deployment for TensorFlow Lite models (support: Image Classification, Object Detection, Text Classification, BERT Question Answer, Audio Classification, Recommendation etc.; API reference).

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Bundling

*   [vite-plugin-dts (⭐1.5k)](https://github.com/qmhc/vite-plugin-dts) - Generate declaration files from `.ts` or `.vue` source files for lib.
items.content_html:
Framework-agnostic Plugins / Bundling

  • vite-plugin-dts (⭐1.5k) - Generate declaration files from .ts or .vue source files for lib.

items.title: Awesome Cybersecurity Blueteam
items.content_text:
### Threat intelligence / Threat hunting

*   [Threat Bus (⭐263)](https://github.com/tenzir/threatbus) - Threat intelligence dissemination layer to connect security tools through a distributed publish/subscribe message broker.
items.content_html:
Threat intelligence / Threat hunting

  • Threat Bus (⭐263) - Threat intelligence dissemination layer to connect security tools through a distributed publish/subscribe message broker.

items.title: Awesome Db Tools
items.content_text:
### GUI

*   [Beekeeper Studio (⭐20k)](https://github.com/beekeeper-studio/beekeeper-studio) - Open Source SQL Editor and Database Manager with a privacy commitment in their mission statement.
items.content_html:
GUI

  • Beekeeper Studio (⭐20k) - Open Source SQL Editor and Database Manager with a privacy commitment in their mission statement.

items.title: Awesome R
items.content_text:
### Graphic Displays

*   [httpgd (⭐448)](https://github.com/nx10/httpgd) - Asynchronous http server graphics device for R.

### Web Technologies and Services

*   [golem](https://thinkr-open.github.io/golem/) - A framework for building production-grade Shiny apps.

### Natural Language Processing

*   [corporaexplorer](https://kgjerde.github.io/corporaexplorer/) - Dynamic exploration of text collections
items.content_html:
Graphic Displays

  • httpgd (⭐448) - Asynchronous http server graphics device for R.

Web Technologies and Services

  • golem - A framework for building production-grade Shiny apps.

Natural Language Processing

  • corporaexplorer - Dynamic exploration of text collections

items.title: Awesome Neovim
items.content_text:
### Color / Diagnostics

*   [winston0410/range-highlight.nvim (⭐209)](https://github.com/winston0410/range-highlight.nvim) - An extremely lightweight plugin (\~ 120loc) that highlights ranges you have entered in commandline.

### Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

*   [sainnhe/gruvbox-material (⭐2.3k)](https://github.com/sainnhe/gruvbox-material) - Gruvbox modification with softer contrast and Tree-sitter support.

### Editing Support / Diagnostics

*   [nacro90/numb.nvim (⭐773)](https://github.com/nacro90/numb.nvim) - Peek lines in a non-obtrusive way.
items.content_html:
Color / Diagnostics

  • winston0410/range-highlight.nvim (⭐209) - An extremely lightweight plugin (~ 120loc) that highlights ranges you have entered in commandline.

Tree-sitter Supported Colorscheme / Diagnostics

  • sainnhe/gruvbox-material (⭐2.3k) - Gruvbox modification with softer contrast and Tree-sitter support.

Editing Support / Diagnostics

  • nacro90/numb.nvim (⭐773) - Peek lines in a non-obtrusive way.

items.title: Awesome Bioinformatics
items.content_text:
### Long-read Assembly / Tools

*   **[canu (⭐683)](https://github.com/marbl/canu)** - A single molecule sequence assembler for genomes large and small.
*   **[flye (⭐849)](https://github.com/fenderglass/Flye)** - De novo assembler for single molecule sequencing reads using repeat graphs.
*   **[hifiasm (⭐654)](https://github.com/chhylp123/hifiasm)** - A haplotype-resolved assembler for accurate Hifi reads.
*   **[wtdbg2 (⭐521)](https://github.com/ruanjue/wtdbg2)** -  A fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to long noisy reads assembly
items.content_html:
Long-read Assembly / Tools

  • canu (⭐683) - A single molecule sequence assembler for genomes large and small.
  • flye (⭐849) - De novo assembler for single molecule sequencing reads using repeat graphs.
  • hifiasm (⭐654) - A haplotype-resolved assembler for accurate Hifi reads.
  • wtdbg2 (⭐521) - A fuzzy Bruijn graph approach to long noisy reads assembly

items.title: Awesome Corda
items.content_text:
### Tools

*   [Splunk App for Corda](https://github.com/splunkdlt/splunk-app-for-corda) - Splunk official integration app for Corda monitoring.

Tools
